name: castform

flavor_text_entries.ruby:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
CASTFORM borrows the power of nature
to transform itself into the guises of
the sun, rain clouds, and snow clouds. This POKéMON’s feelings change with the
weather.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It alters its form depending on the
weather. Changes in the climate such as
the temperature and humidity appear to
affect its cellular structure.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It has the ability to change its form into
the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, 
depending on the weather.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It has the ability to change its form into
the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, 
depending on the weather.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
This Pokémon can change its cells,
taking different forms based on
the temperature and humidity.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
This Pokémon can change its cells,
taking different forms based on
the temperature and humidity.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Its appearance changes with the
weather. Recently, its molecules
were found to be just like water.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Temperature and weather affect its
cellular structure, so this Pokémon
changes form according to the weather.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Temperature and weather affect its
cellular structure, so this Pokémon
changes form according to the weather.
flavor_text_entries.x:
This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different
forms based on the temperature and humidity.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It has the ability to change its form into the sun,
the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on
the weather.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Castform’s appearance changes with the weather.
This Pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of
nature to protect its tiny body.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Castform borrows the power of nature to transform itself
into the guises of the sun, rain, and snow-clouds.
This Pokémon’s feelings change with the weather.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
It changes its form depending on the weather.
Changes in the temperature or humidity
appear to affect its cellular structure.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Its form changes on its own, due to its cells’
sensitive reactions to temperature and humidity.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Although its form changes with the weather,
that is apparently the result of a chemical
reaction and not the result of its own free will.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Its form changes depending on the weather.
The rougher conditions get, the rougher
Castform’s disposition!

form_descriptions: Form changes along with type to match the weather in battle, due to forecast.  Castform is always in its normal form outside of battle, regardless of weather.
